item.title: OnePlus 13 series launch: Where and when to watch the livestream. Check expected price, features - The Economic Times
item.description:
OnePlus 13 series launch: Where and when to watch the livestream. Check expected price, features

Publication Date: January 7, 2025
Source: OnePlus Press Release

The much-anticipated launch of the OnePlus 13 series will take place during the Winter Launch Event, showcasing advanced features and specifications.

Where and When to Watch the Livestream

The event will be live-streamed on OnePlus India’s official YouTube channel, website, and social media channels.

OnePlus 13: What to Expect?

  • 6.82-inch BOE X2 2K+ AMOLED display with 4,500 nits peak brightness and 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset with up to 24GB of LPDDR5X RAM.
  • Features a Hasselblad-powered triple-camera system with three 50MP sensors.
  • 6,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging capabilities.
  • Available in three colors: Midnight Ocean, Arctic Dawn, and Black Eclipse.
  • IP68 and IP69 water and dust resistance ratings.

OnePlus 13R: The Affordable Flagship

Also launching is the OnePlus 13R, offering high-end features at a competitive price point. It will feature a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor and up to 16GB of RAM.

OnePlus Buds Pro 3

The event will unveil the Sapphire Blue variant of OnePlus Buds Pro 3, featuring AI Translation capabilities.

Accessories and Pricing Expectations

The OnePlus 13 is expected to be priced between Rs 67,000 and Rs 70,000, with the OnePlus 13R under Rs 40,000.

Mark your calendars for January 7, 2025, to witness OnePlus's latest innovations.

item.title: 'Rafael Nadal comes out as gay ...': Apple AI gets it wrong again - The Times of India
item.description:
Rafael Nadal Comes Out as Gay: Apple AI Gets It Wrong Again

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Unspecified

The article discusses a recent controversy surrounding Rafael Nadal coming out as gay, highlighting how Apple AI misinterpreted the situation.

  • Rafael Nadal's announcement has garnered significant media attention.
  • Apple AI mistakenly reported Nadal's sexual orientation, causing public confusion.
  • Nadal has addressed the misinformation through social media.
  • The incident reflects ongoing challenges in AI interpretation of human identity.
“AI still has a long way to go in understanding human nuances.” - Rafael Nadal

This incident raises questions about the reliability of AI in interpreting sensitive personal information.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro, Realme 14 Pro+ Official India Launch Date Confirmed; Could Debut With Colour-Changing Technology – Check Expected Specs and Price - Zee News
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro, Realme 14 Pro+ Official India Launch Date Confirmed; Could Debut With Colour-Changing Technology – Check Expected Specs and Price

Date & Source: January 16, 2024, Zee News

The Chinese smartphone manufacturer Realme has confirmed the launch date of the Realme 14 Pro series in India. The series includes the Realme 14 Pro and Realme 14 Pro+ smartphones that will be available on Flipkart and the Realme website.

The Realme 14 Pro series is set to feature significant advancements, including:

  • Launch Date: January 16 at 12 PM IST
  • Powered by Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor
  • Available in four color variants: Pearl White, Suede Grey, Bikaner Purple, and Jaipur Pink
  • Pearl White variant features color-changing technology when immersed in water below 16 degrees Celsius
  • Expected prices: Rs 26,999 for Realme 14 Pro and Rs 32,999 for the Pro+ model
  • Realme 14 Pro+ to feature advanced camera system with 50MP periscope lens
  • Both models expected to have a massive 6,000mAh battery with IP68 rating
“The new smartphones are likely to offer the world's first triple flash with the cameras.”

Overall, the Realme 14 Pro series promises to bring cutting-edge specifications and innovative features to the Indian smartphone market.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 5G series launching on 9 Jan: Expected Indian pricing, specs, and colour options | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 5G series launching on 9 Jan: Expected Indian pricing, specs, and colour options

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Live Mint

Oppo is gearing up to launch its much-anticipated Reno 13 5G series in India on January 9, introducing the Reno 13 5G and the Reno 13 Pro 5G with exciting new features.

Expected Pricing in India

  • Reno 13 5G starting at ₹37,999 for the 8GB + 128GB variant.
  • 256GB model likely to cost ₹39,999.
  • Reno 13 Pro 5G expected starting price of ₹49,999 for the 12GB + 256GB version and ₹54,999 for the 512GB model.

Expected Specifications

  • Reno 13 available in Ivory White and Luminous Blue.
  • Reno 13 Pro offered in Graphite Grey and Mist Lavender.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8350 SoC with SignalBoost X1.
  • Reno 13 Pro 5G expected to feature a 50MP periscope telephoto camera.
  • Both models equipped with advanced AI imaging features and large batteries.
“The Reno 13 Pro 5G will likely feature a 50MP periscope telephoto shooter, offering 3.5x optical zoom.”

The launch of the Reno 13 series marks a significant step for Oppo in enhancing its smartphone offerings in India, aiming to attract tech enthusiasts.

item.title: Bird Buddy expands into insects with Wonder line - TechCrunch
item.description:
Bird Buddy Expands into Insect Technology with Wonder Line

Publication Date: 1 hour ago | Source: TechCrunch

Bird Buddy’s smart bird feeders have merged various consumer technologies to enhance wildlife interaction. At CES 2025, they announced their new Wonder line focused on pollinators.

  • The Wonder line includes two products: Petal and Wonder Blocks.
  • Petal functions like a trail camera for insects and integrates AI to live stream wildlife to devices.
  • Blocks is a modular ecosystem for creating biodiverse natural settings.
  • The line emphasizes innovative design, including solar-powered elements.
“Petal seamlessly merges cutting-edge engineering and technology to snap and live stream wildlife direct to your smartphone or smart device of choice.”

The introduction of these products highlights a growing trend of integrating technology with nature, aiming to enrich our understanding of insect life.

item.title: Intel’s new Core Ultra 200HX series CPUs are ready for next-gen gaming laptops - The Verge
item.description:
Intel Unveils Core Ultra 200HX CPUs for Next-Gen Gaming Laptops

Publication Date: January 2024

Source: The Verge

Intel has announced the Arrow Lake family of CPUs at CES, highlighting the new Core Ultra 200HX series designed for gaming laptops.

  • The 200HX series CPUs offer up to 5% better single-thread and 20% better multi-thread performance compared to previous models.
  • Targeting gaming laptops, the flagship Intel Core Ultra 9 285HX features 24 cores and boosts up to 5.5GHz.
  • New laptops with advanced Nvidia GPUs are expected to launch in late Q1.
  • The 200H and 200U series cater to thin-and-light laptops, emphasizing graphics performance improvements at lower power usage.
“The new gaming laptops with the latest discrete GPUs will be coming in late Q1.”

Intel's latest CPUs signify a push in high-performance gaming technology, aiming to enhance user experience in the competitive gaming market.

item.title: One UI 7 Beta 3 update rolling out to Samsung Galaxy S24 series - Sammy Fans
item.description:
One UI 7 Beta 3 Update Now Available for Samsung Galaxy S24 Series

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Sammy Fans

Samsung has commenced the rollout of the Android 15-based One UI 7 Beta 3 update for its Galaxy S24 series, with the update currently available in Germany and plans for broader distribution to follow.

  • The update is identified by the following build versions:
    • S921BXXU4ZXLJ – Galaxy S24
    • S926BXXU4ZXLJ – Galaxy S24 Plus
    • S928BXXU4ZXLJ – Galaxy S24 Ultra
  • It includes several bug fixes and improvements, enhancing the overall user experience.
  • The update adds the latest January 2025 security patch for better security and stability.
  • Improvements include smoother vertical scrolling in the app drawer and fixes for MMS image saving issues in the Samsung Messages app.
  • Changes to the Game Booster include new default screen playback settings and a maximum FPS adjustment for better gaming performance.
  • Nowbar placement issues and alignment problems with various icons on the lock screen are also addressed in this update.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 5G Series Price in India Tipped Ahead of January 9 Launch - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 5G Series Price in India Tipped Ahead of Launch

Publication Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Gadgets 360

The Oppo Reno 13 5G series is set to launch in India soon, with details on design, features, and pricing emerging ahead of the official announcement.

  • The series will include Oppo Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro, powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8350 SoCs.
  • Pricing is estimated to start at Rs. 37,999 for the 8GB + 128GB variant of the Reno 13.
  • The Reno 13 Pro with 12GB RAM is expected to be available for Rs. 49,999 and Rs. 54,999 for 256GB and 512GB options, respectively.
  • Features include IP68 and IP69 ratings for water and dust resistance, and support for 80W wired charging.
“Both Oppo Reno 13 5G and Reno 13 Pro 5G will carry the in-house SignalBoost X1 chips.”

With notable advancements, the Oppo Reno 13 series is drawing attention ahead of its official launch, promising significant enhancements over its predecessor.

item.title: The challenge for made-in-America bikes? Made-in-China parts | Mint - Mint
item.description:
The Challenge for Made-in-America Bikes: Sourcing Components from China

Publication Date: 2022

Source: Mint

In 2022, Brian Riley opened a bicycle factory in Seymour, Ind., shifting production of his Guardian Bikes brand to the U.S. from China. The main challenge he faces is that nearly all parts still come from China.

  • Riley aimed to use American-made components since before the November presidential election of Donald Trump, who promised to impose tariffs on Chinese imports.
  • The reliance on Chinese parts undermines the goal of promoting American manufacturing.
“The problem for him now: Nearly all the parts still come from China.”

This situation highlights the ongoing challenge for domestic manufacturers trying to reduce dependency on foreign suppliers while also managing cost and quality.

item.title: CES 2025: Samsung's Vision AI adds Live Translate, Click to Search, and more AI features to its TVs - The Times of India
item.description:
CES 2025: Samsung's Vision AI adds Live Translate, Click to Search, and more AI features to its TVs

Publication Date: January 10, 2025

Source: TechCrunch

At CES 2025, Samsung unveiled its Vision AI technology that adds impressive new features to its TVs, making viewing experiences smarter and more interactive.

  • Introduction of Live Translate for real-time language translation during streaming.
  • Click to Search feature for easy online search using video content.
  • Enhanced AI capabilities for personalized viewing recommendations.
"Our goal is to make entertainment more accessible and enjoyable for everyone," said a Samsung representative.

This updated technology represents Samsung's commitment to integrating AI in consumer electronics, promising to transform how viewers interact with their TV content.

item.title: Winter Launch Event: What to expect from OnePlus 13 series launch on Jan 7 - Business Standard
item.description:
Winter Launch Event: What to Expect from OnePlus 13 Series on January 7

Publication Date: January 5, 2024 | Source: OnePlus Official Announcement

OnePlus is gearing up for the launch of its flagship OnePlus 13 series smartphones at the Winter Launch Event on January 7, with highlights including the OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13r, and new wireless earbuds.

Key Points:

  • The event will begin at 9 PM IST and will be livestreamed on YouTube.
  • OnePlus 13 will feature Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and be available in three colors.
  • Specifications include a 6.82-inch AMOLED display, up to 24GB RAM, and dual IP68/IP69 ratings for water and dust resistance.
  • OnePlus 13r is expected to be a rebranded version of OnePlus Ace 5 with similar features and design.
  • New OnePlus Buds Pro 3 in Sapphire Blue will be launched, alongside magnetic charging accessories.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

“Expect a new level of performance and design from the OnePlus 13 series, showcasing our commitment to innovation.”

Conclusion:

The Winter Launch Event promises exciting new products from OnePlus, emphasizing advanced technology and design, setting a benchmark for the smartphone market in 2024.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro series 5G to launch on January 16 with this India-exclusive feature: Details inside - The Financial Express
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro Series 5G Launching in India on January 16

Publication Date: January 12, 2024 Source: Financial Express

The Realme 14 Pro series 5G is set for a global launch on January 16, including an India-exclusive feature. The phones will showcase unique color-changing designs using thermochromic pigments.

  • The series includes Realme 14 Pro and Realme 14 Pro Plus.
  • Features an innovative pearl white color that changes to blue in cold temperatures.
  • Also available in India-exclusive colors: Bikaner Purple and Jaipur Pink.
  • Teased specs include a quad-curved display and Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor.
“These variants capture the essence of these historic Indian cities.” - Realme

The Realme 14 Pro series aims to differentiate itself with unique design features and specifications, appealing to the Indian market.

item.title: Best camera phones under ₹25000: Motorola Edge 50 Neo, Realme 13 Pro, and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Best Camera Phones Under ₹25000: Motorola Edge 50 Neo, Realme 13 Pro, and More

Date: Upcoming, Source: Live Mint

As e-commerce platforms gear up for sales around Republic Day, here’s a curated list of the best camera phones available under ₹25000 from brands like Motorola and Realme for those on a budget.

  • Motorola Edge 50 Neo: Boasts a 50 MP main camera, 13 MP ultrawide, and 10 MP telephoto lens, alongside a 32 MP selfie camera.
  • Realme 13 Pro: Features a 50 MP main camera with Sony LYT 600 sensor and a dual-camera setup, including a 32 MP selfie camera.
  • Nothing Phone 2a: Highlights include a unique design and a dual-camera system with two 50MP lenses.
  • OnePlus Nord CE 4: Equipped with a 50 MP main camera and 16 MP front-facing camera.
  • iQOO Z9s Pro: Features a dual camera setup with a 50MP main sensor and an 8 MP ultrawide lens.
“If you have a limited budget, but want a feature-filled smartphone with a good camera, then we have got you covered.”

With various options available, users can find a suitable camera phone without breaking the bank.

item.title: iPhone 16 selling at Rs 11,000 discount: All details here - India Today
item.description:
iPhone 16 Available at Rs 11,000 Discount: Details Inside

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: India Today

The iPhone 16 is currently being offered at a record low price on Flipkart, with discounts reaching up to Rs 11,000.

  • The iPhone 16 128GB model is on sale for Rs 72,900, reduced from Rs 79,900.
  • Customers can avail an additional Rs 4,000 discount with SBI and ICICI credit cards.
  • The iPhone 16 features advanced Apple Intelligence and the latest A18 chip for improved performance.
  • It includes a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display and a sophisticated camera system.
  • The device is also IP68-rated for water and dust resistance.
“Now, you can get up to Rs 11,000 off on the iPhone 16.”

This discount makes the iPhone 16 an attractive option for those looking to upgrade their smartphones.

item.title: iPhone 17 Air Could Be Thinner Than Samsung's Galaxy S25 Slim; Price Range Tipped - Gadgets 360
item.description:
iPhone 17 Air, Galaxy S25 Slim Thickness, Pricing Suggested in New Leak

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Gadgets360

Apple and Samsung are set to release their new slim flagship models this year, with rumored specifications and pricing details emerging ahead of their official announcements.

  • The iPhone 17 Air is expected to replace the Plus version in Apple's lineup, launching in September.
  • The Galaxy S25 Slim may be released later, with a rumored availability in the second or third quarter of the year.
  • iPhone 17 Air could have a thickness of 6.25mm, while Galaxy S25 Slim may feature a mid-6mm profile.
  • Pricing for iPhone 17 Air is expected to range between $1,299 and $1,500, higher than the iPhone 16 Plus.
  • Samsung is said to be applying new technology to reduce camera size in the upcoming models.
“The price of this model could be lower than that of the top-of-the-line Ultra model.”

This event highlights the competitive nature of the smartphone market as both companies aim to attract consumers with their latest innovations.

item.title: Samsung Unveils Vision AI Technology for Its 2025 Smart TV Lineup at CES 2025 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Samsung Introduces Vision AI Features for Its 2025 Smart TV Lineup

Publication Date: Monday, 2025
Source: Gadgets 360

Samsung has unveiled its new Vision AI technology, aimed to enhance the capabilities of its smart TVs, monitors, and other screen-based devices, expected to launch at CES 2025 in Las Vegas.

  • Vision AI aims to transform smart TVs into interactive, intelligent partners.
  • New features include Click to Search, which identifies content on-screen.
  • A Live Translate feature allows real-time subtitle translations.
  • Users can generate wallpapers and use screens as smart home hubs via SmartThings.
  • Pet and Family Care feature adjusts room settings automatically based on activities.
  • Vision AI enhances picture and sound quality through dynamic analysis.
"Vision AI will turn our smart TVs from a ‘one-directional device for passive consumption’ into interactive, intelligent partners that can adapt to users' needs." - Samsung spokesperson

These advancements are expected to significantly enhance user experience and integration with smart home technologies.

item.title: Luke Littler Won, Rafael Nadal Gay: Apple Intelligence Faces Fire Over Erroneous News Summaries - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Apple Intelligence Under Scrutiny Over Erroneous News Summaries

Publication Date: January 6, 2025

Source: Bloomberg Quint

Recent errors indicate that Apple Intelligence might require much more work before it can be trusted with providing accurate information in its AI summaries.

  • Apple's AI summary feature has been critiqued for significant errors, including false headlines about Luke Littler winning a match before it occurred.
  • Another false summary claimed tennis star Rafael Nadal had come out as gay.
  • Apple introduced this feature in iOS 18.2 to give users quick notifications without full content.
  • Apple acknowledged the errors and encouraged user feedback to improve the system.
  • Reporters Without Borders has called for Apple to disable the feature due to risks to accurate reporting.
“Apple has admitted the possibility of mistakes and encouraged users to report any inaccuracies.”

In light of these incidents, there are concerns regarding the reliability of Apple's AI news summaries, emphasizing the need for careful oversight and improvement in the technology used.

item.title: Wipro veteran quits for CEO role at smaller firm | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Wipro veteran quits for CEO role at smaller firm

Publication Date: N/A, Source: Live Mint

Srini Rajamani, a senior executive at Wipro, has left the company to become CEO of Opus Technologies, a fintech firm based in the US. This marks a notable exit from the IT services giant.

  • Rajamani led Wipro's life sciences and consumer businesses.
  • Opus Technologies specializes in card management systems and payment gateways.
  • The firm has a workforce of around 800 employees, with offices in Pune, Hyderabad, the UK, US, and Canada.
“A senior Wipro Ltd executive overseeing a third of the company’s business has resigned.”

This departure is part of a trend of high-profile exits from Wipro, which may have implications for the company's future leadership and strategy.

item.title: LG 2025 OLED Evo TVs With Alpha 11 AI Processor Unveiled Ahead of CES 2025 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
LG Unveils 2025 Lineup of OLED Evo TVs Ahead of CES 2025

Published on: January 7, 2025, Source: Gadgets 360

LG has introduced its 2025 OLED Evo TVs in Seoul, featuring the new Alpha 11 processor and advanced AI functionality, aiming to enhance viewing experiences.

  • The 2025 OLED Evo TVs leverage AI Search for improved contextual understanding.
  • They feature Brightness Booster Ultimate technology, achieving up to three times higher brightness than conventional models.
  • Supports Filmmaker Mode with Ambient Light Compensation for optimized viewing in various lighting.
  • Gaming features include 165Hz VRR at 4K and reduced input lag up to 165 fps.
  • Awarded multiple certifications for color fidelity and image quality.
“The LG 2025 OLED Evo TVs not only enhance visual quality but also integrate cutting-edge AI to understand user preferences.” - LG's statement

These advancements showcase LG's commitment to pushing the boundaries of display technology while featuring numerous connectivity and audio enhancements.
